mapper.select:
/* MemberFgMapper.getMemberPrepaid */
SELECT tmmps.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, tmmps.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_NM, SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) AS TEL_NO
FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_PREPAID_STORE tmmps, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm, TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS tmmc WHERE tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND tmmps.USE_YN = 'Y' AND tms.STORE_CD = tmmps.STORE_CD AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD AND tmm.MEMBR_NO = tmmps.MEMBR_NO AND tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD
AND tmmps.MEMBR_NO LIKE '%'|| #{membrNo} ||'%'
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) LIKE '%'|| #{membrNm} ||'%'
AND tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = #{membrClassCd}
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) LIKE '%'|| REPLACE(#{telNo}, '-','') ||'%'
AND tms.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND tms.STORE_CD != #{defaultStoreCd}
ORDER BY tmmps.MEMBR_NO, tmmps.STORE_CD
SELECT tmmps.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, tmmps.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_NM, SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) AS TEL_NO
FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_PREPAID_STORE tmmps, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm, TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS tmmc WHERE tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND tmmps.USE_YN = 'Y' AND tmmps.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tms.STORE_CD = tmmps.STORE_CD AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD AND tmm.MEMBR_NO = tmmps.MEMBR_NO AND tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD
AND tmmps.MEMBR_NO LIKE '%'|| #{membrNo} ||'%'
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) LIKE '%'|| #{membrNm} ||'%'
AND tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = #{membrClassCd}
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) LIKE '%'|| REPLACE(#{telNo}, '-','') ||'%'
ORDER BY tmmps.MEMBR_NO, tmmps.STORE_CD

/* MemberFgMapper.getMemberNoPrepaid */
SELECT tmm.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_NM, SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) AS TEL_NO
FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm, TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS tmmc WHERE tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD AND tms.STORE_CD||tmm.MEMBR_NO NOT IN (SELECT STORE_CD||MEMBR_NO FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_PREPAID_STORE WHERE MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y')
AND tmm.MEMBR_NO LIKE '%'|| #{membrNo} ||'%'
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) LIKE '%'|| #{membrNm} ||'%'
AND tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = #{membrClassCd}
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) LIKE '%'|| REPLACE(#{telNo}, '-','') ||'%'
AND tms.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND tms.STORE_CD != #{defaultStoreCd}
ORDER BY tmm.MEMBR_NO, tms.STORE_CD
SELECT tmm.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_NM, SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) AS TEL_NO
FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm, TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS tmmc WHERE tms.STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tms.STORE_CD
AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD
AND tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD AND tms.STORE_CD||tmm.MEMBR_NO NOT IN (SELECT STORE_CD||MEMBR_NO FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_PREPAID_STORE WHERE MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y')
AND tmm.MEMBR_NO LIKE '%'|| #{membrNo} ||'%'
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) LIKE '%'|| #{membrNm} ||'%'
AND tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = #{membrClassCd}
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) LIKE '%'|| REPLACE(#{telNo}, '-','') ||'%'
AND tmm.REG_STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
ORDER BY tmm.MEMBR_NO, tms.STORE_CD

/* MemberFgMapper.getMemberPostpaid */
SELECT tmmps.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, tmmps.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_NM, SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) AS TEL_NO
FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_POSTPAID_STORE tmmps, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm, TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS tmmc WHERE tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND tmmps.USE_YN = 'Y' AND tms.STORE_CD = tmmps.STORE_CD AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD AND tmm.MEMBR_NO = tmmps.MEMBR_NO AND tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD
AND tmmps.MEMBR_NO LIKE '%'|| #{membrNo} ||'%'
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) LIKE '%'|| #{membrNm} ||'%'
AND tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = #{membrClassCd}
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) LIKE '%'|| REPLACE(#{telNo}, '-','') ||'%'
AND tms.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND tms.STORE_CD != #{defaultStoreCd}
ORDER BY tmmps.MEMBR_NO, tmmps.STORE_CD
SELECT tmmps.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, tmmps.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_NM, SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) AS TEL_NO
FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_POSTPAID_STORE tmmps, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm, TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS tmmc WHERE tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND tmmps.USE_YN = 'Y' AND tmmps.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tms.STORE_CD = tmmps.STORE_CD AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD AND tmm.MEMBR_NO = tmmps.MEMBR_NO AND tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD
AND tmmps.MEMBR_NO LIKE '%'|| #{membrNo} ||'%'
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) LIKE '%'|| #{membrNm} ||'%'
AND tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = #{membrClassCd}
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) LIKE '%'|| REPLACE(#{telNo}, '-','') ||'%'
ORDER BY tmmps.MEMBR_NO, tmmps.STORE_CD

/* MemberFgMapper.getMemberNoPostpaid */
SELECT tmm.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_NM, SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) AS TEL_NO
FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm, TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS tmmc WHERE tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD AND tms.STORE_CD||tmm.MEMBR_NO NOT IN (SELECT STORE_CD||MEMBR_NO FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_POSTPAID_STORE WHERE MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y')
AND tmm.MEMBR_NO LIKE '%'|| #{membrNo} ||'%'
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) LIKE '%'|| #{membrNm} ||'%'
AND tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = #{membrClassCd}
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) LIKE '%'|| REPLACE(#{telNo}, '-','') ||'%'
AND tms.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND tms.STORE_CD != #{defaultStoreCd}
ORDER BY tmm.MEMBR_NO, tms.STORE_CD
SELECT tmm.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_NM, SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) AS TEL_NO
FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm, TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS tmmc WHERE tms.STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tms.STORE_CD
AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmmc.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD
AND tmmc.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD AND tms.STORE_CD||tmm.MEMBR_NO NOT IN (SELECT STORE_CD||MEMBR_NO FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_POSTPAID_STORE WHERE MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y')
AND tmm.MEMBR_NO LIKE '%'|| #{membrNo} ||'%'
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) LIKE '%'|| #{membrNm} ||'%'
AND tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = #{membrClassCd}
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.TEL_NO) LIKE '%'|| REPLACE(#{telNo}, '-','') ||'%'
AND tmm.REG_STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
ORDER BY tmm.MEMBR_NO, tms.STORE_CD
mapper.update: /* MemberFgMapper.regPrepaid */ MERGE INTO TB_MB_MEMBER_PREPAID_STORE tmmps USING DUAL ON ( tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND tmmps.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmmps.MEMBR_NO = #{membrNo} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tmmps.USE_YN = #{useYn}, tmmps.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, tmmps.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD, tmmps.MEMBR_NO, tmmps.STORE_CD, tmmps.USE_YN, tmmps.REG_DT, tmmps.REG_ID, tmmps.MOD_DT, tmmps.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{membrOrgnCd}, #{membrNo}, #{storeCd}, #{useYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* MemberFgMapper.regPostpaid */ MERGE INTO TB_MB_MEMBER_POSTPAID_STORE tmmps USING DUAL ON ( tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND tmmps.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmmps.MEMBR_NO = #{membrNo} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tmmps.USE_YN = #{useYn}, tmmps.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, tmmps.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( tmmps.MEMBR_ORGN_CD, tmmps.MEMBR_NO, tmmps.STORE_CD, tmmps.USE_YN, tmmps.REG_DT, tmmps.REG_ID, tmmps.MOD_DT, tmmps.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{membrOrgnCd}, #{membrNo}, #{storeCd}, #{useYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
